text: Hay kasamasama o manga jinn go manga manosiya! Ba da a miyakatalingoma rkano a manga sogo a pd rkano, a mapphanothol iran rkano so manga ayat Akn, go mipphamakaiktiyar iran rkano so kitmo ko alongan iyo wai?" Tharoon iran: "Pizaksian ami a sala so manga ginawa mi. Na miyakalimpang kiran so kawyagoyag ko doniya. Na zaksian iran a ginawa iran sa mataan! a siran na da pamaratiyaya
